backend.name: FluidSynth - PortAudio_ALL (64-bit)
backend.description:
contents:
· FluidSynth 1.1.11 release built with Dsound and PortAudio (64-bit) · PortAudio 19 built with ASIO, WASAPI, and WDM Kernel Streaming (64-bit) · GLib 2.0
ASIO is a trademark and software of Steinberg Media Technologies GmbH. ASIO Interface Technology by Steinberg Media Technologies GmbH.
